1.content:
Through the first door is a muscular master ready to dominate you with his fantastic, flexing muscles.

Through the second door is an obese master ready to make you worship his wonderfully round and fat belly.

Through the third door is a former bodybuilder who put on a few pounds who has a nice, firm, round belly with his muscles, ready to dominate you.

Through the fourth door is a very experienced muscle master ready to take you under with fresh bottles of poppers.

Through the fifth door are more doors for more masters to choose from.
1.title: Make your decision, choose your door

choices: You try to run back out the door
You use magic to make him bigger
12.content:
His name is Alex. He is about 6'5 and 380 lbs of pure fat. Don't be fooled by his lard though. He knew how to use it well on small guys like you.

"What do you want twerp? Don't you see I'm busy eating and making myself more powerful by the minute? How dare you interrupt?!" He yells, between bites of food.

What do you do?
12.title: Obese big-bellied master

info.brief_description: Your gay muscular or fat master dominates you in fun ways!
info.description:
Gay muscle masters and fat masters get cocky and dominate you with their power!

Only rules I've got are no women, this is strictly gay. No scat or pissplay. Nothing overly nasty. Other than that, go wild.
